text: Can i get a :point_up_2::skin-tone-2: reaction if you’ve ever been so excited about a website, knew it’d be a portfolio item, but then the client ruined the design with the dnd background image field (or whatever design flexibility you gave them) :cry:

Hi everyone !  I am kind of new to hubSpot. I am trying to pull out the content of the email template. But can not find a way to do that...
Questions
1. Does the content  of the email template stored somewhere in snowflake? 
2. have tried this API <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/templates/get_templates_template_id> , but always get `NOT FOUND` response using the `TEMPLATE_ID` founded in snowflake
Could some provide some help here? Thanks!
